attributes.action: Force oil companys to pass on the drop in oil prices, and to stop their control on oil prices.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Oil company's should have government control on them to stop the free rain they have on fuel prices.

The price per barrel goes down the pump price stays the same or goes up.  Their profits go up, and the bosses get fat paychecks!

rejection.details: This petitions overlaps with several already in  existence: http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/OilPrice/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
